name: components
description: Vue UI components for the isocubic application: editors, previews, panels, and tools

ActionHistory.vue.description: Action history panel showing undo/redo operations

AnnotationCanvas.vue.description: Canvas overlay for drawing annotations on the 3D scene

AuthForms.vue.description: Authentication forms for login and registration

CollaborativeParamEditor.vue.description: Collaborative parameter editor with real-time sync

CommandBar.test.ts.description: Tests for the CommandBar component (alternate test file)

CommandBar.vue.description: Command palette for quick access to application actions

CommentsSection.vue.description: Comments section for discussing cube designs

ComponentContextPanel.vue.description: Panel showing context and metadata for selected components

ComponentInfo.vue.description: Component information display with MetaMode integration

ConversationPanel.vue.description: AI conversation panel for natural language interaction

CubeGrid.vue.description: Grid layout for displaying multiple cube previews

CubePreview.vue.description: 3D preview renderer for a single parametric cube

CubeStackGrid.vue.description: Grid layout for displaying multiple cube stacks

MetaModeIndicator.vue.description: Visual indicator showing when MetaMode is active

DraggableWindow.test.ts.description: Tests for the DraggableWindow component (alternate test file)

DraggableWindow.vue.description: Draggable and resizable window container for the window manager

EnergyCube.vue.description: Energy-visualized parametric cube with animated effects

EnergyVisualizationEditor.vue.description: Editor for configuring energy visualization parameters

ExportPanel.vue.description: Panel for exporting cube designs in various formats

ExtendedSearchPanel.vue.description: Advanced search panel with filters for finding cube designs

FFTChannelEditor.vue.description: Editor for FFT frequency channel configuration

Gallery.vue.description: Gallery view for browsing saved cube presets

MetaModeProvider.test.ts.description: Tests for the MetaMode provider integration

IssueDraftPanel.vue.description: Panel for drafting GitHub issues from the application

LODConfigEditor.vue.description: Editor for Level of Detail (LOD) configuration

LODCubeGrid.vue.description: Cube grid with Level of Detail (LOD) rendering support

LODStatisticsDisplay.vue.description: Display panel for LOD rendering statistics

MagicCubeDemo.vue.description: Demo component showcasing magic cube effects

MetamodeTreeNode.vue.description: Recursive tree node component for displaying MetaMode hierarchy

MetamodeTreePanel.vue.description: Panel displaying the compiled MetaMode tree in a collapsible tree view

ParamEditor.vue.description: Parameter editor for adjusting cube properties

ParticipantCursor.vue.description: Collaborative cursor showing other participants' positions

PromptGenerator.vue.description: AI prompt generator for creating cube designs from text

SessionPanel.vue.description: Panel for managing collaborative editing sessions

SharePanel.vue.description: Panel for sharing cube designs via links

StackEditor.vue.description: Editor for configuring cube stack arrangements

StackPresetPicker.vue.description: Picker for selecting predefined cube stack presets

SubscriptionButton.vue.description: Button for managing subscription to updates

UnifiedEditor.vue.description: Unified editor combining parameter editing and preview

UserProfile.vue.description: User profile display and settings component

WindowTaskbar.test.ts.description: Tests for the WindowTaskbar component (alternate test file)

WindowTaskbar.vue.description: Taskbar for managing open windows in the window manager

windows.description: Window-wrapped components for the window manager system
